channel.title: tech giants on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in tech giants on FinanClub

item.title: GOOGL
item.description: score:-41 Chances: Google’s stock is leading near buy points, suggesting growth potential. Investors looking for AI stocks might consider Google as a genius stock. Positive predictions for Google’s AI growth highlight potential opportunities. Expansion of Google’s free streaming lineup on Google TV is a positive move.

item.title: QCOM
item.description: score:1004 Chances: Qualcomm’s support for new iPhone models suggests improved chip volumes for the current quarter. Positive results from tech giants’ quarterly reports despite some being muted. Formation of a new company by chipmakers, including Qualcomm, to develop RISC-V technology. Qualcomm’s daily gain and EPS performance raise questions about its valuation and potential for investors.
